name: dicesmith.
description:
As a dice maker, your only allies on your adventures in the wilderness are your six trusty dices.

Fight enemies by choosing a dice to roll each turn and acting upon its result.

But beware,  monsters roam about with dices ready to brawl against yours.

Predict your enemies' actions and act upon them to survive.

Take a breather in-between your encounters to hone your weapons.

Gain new dice faces after each fight and upgrade your dices.

How far can you roll?

Made with Godot for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.
